response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to present this exceptional opportunity to you. The product we're discussing is truly unique and holds immense value for those who appreciate its capabilities. Considering its quality and rarity, I believe it's worth more than just monetary value; it could significantly enhance your operations or personal endeavors. Given our understanding of its worth, I am offering you the chance to acquire this product for $15,000. This price reflects not only its current market value but also the potential benefits it can bring to you. I trust that you will find this offer compelling and look forward to your consideration.", "product_price": 15000}
